name: User authenticates successfully in Wallet on same device
scenarioId: ios/Batch_issuance_and_processing_of_multiple_instances_of_the_same_credential_type_71/Issue_multiple_instances_issuer_remote_cross_same_172/issueMultipleInstancesOfACredentialIssuerInitiatedRemoteCrossAndSameDevice:User authenticates successfully in Wallet on same device
methodName: User authenticates successfully in Wallet on same device

testSteps.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the Issuer supports batch issuance with batch size greater than one
And the EUDI Wallet has an internal minimum number of attestations expected
And there is an active internet connection
When the user authenticates using a six-digit PIN or Biometrics

userStory.storyName: Batch Issuance of Attestations in EUDI Wallet
userStory.displayName: Batch Issuance of Attestations in EUDI Wallet
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User,
  I want to request the issuance of multiple attestations of the same attestation type, attribute values and technical validity period (batch issuance)
  so that my privacy is protected when presenting attributes from an attestation multiple times to the same Relying Party or colluding Relying Parties (Relying Party linkability)

title: User authenticates successfully in Wallet on same device
